hook: Arre virus? Mere computer mein? Main toh sirf dukaan ka kaam karta hoon. Aapko kaise pata virus hai?
Microsoft support se ho? Oh no... mere computer mein virus aa gaya kya? Kaise hua yeh?
Remote access? Matlab aap wahan se mera computer control karoge? Mujhe samajh nahi aa raha.
tangent: Okay sir, main try kar raha hoon. Aapka naam aur department kya hai? Employee ID bhi bol do.
Computer back room mein hai. Dukaan pe customer hai. Aap thoda slowly guide karo please.
Agar call cut ho gaya toh main kahan call karoon? Aapka exact phone number/WhatsApp number bhej do.
friction: Computer abhi boot ho raha hai. Windows logo aa raha hai. Aaj bahut slow chal raha hai.
Chrome open ho gaya, par website nahi khul rahi. Aap exact domain/URL repeat kar do, spelling mein confusion hota hai.
Download start nahi ho raha. WiFi shared hai 3 dukaanon ke saath, isliye speed slow hai.
Popup aa raha hai 'Allow this app to make changes'. Sir, Yes karoon ya nahi? Dar lag raha hai.
Ab admin password maang raha hai. Login wala same hota hai kya? Mera password diary mein hai, ek minute.
near_miss: TeamViewer open ho gaya aur 'Your ID' aur 'Password' dikh raha hai. Numbers chhote hain, ek minute ruko please.
Sir, ID/password bolne se pehle aapka callback number confirm kar do. Galat bande ko de diya toh problem ho jayegi.
Main password share karne se thoda uncomfortable hoon. Aap exactly kya karoge connect hone ke baad? Bas virus remove karna hai na?
Abhi screen pe fee/charge ka popup aaya. Is it free or paid? Pehle clear batao sir.
endurance: Sir, mera regular computer wala ladka kal aa raha hai maintenance ke liye. Main usse check karwa lunga, phir aapko update karta hoon.
Customers wait kar rahe hain. Main abhi busy ho jaunga. Aap apna number bhej do, main baad mein call back kar lunga.
Internet slow hai aur baar baar hang ho raha hai. Kal try karte hain? Abhi time waste ho raha hai.

hook: Crypto investment? Sir I have heard many scams in this. Please explain slowly in simple words.
Guaranteed returns in one week sounds too good. How is it guaranteed, and what is the catch?
Okay I am interested but nervous. Company name and location kya hai?
tangent: Do you have an official website? Exact link bhej do so I can read first.
Government approval/registration hai kya? SEBI/RBI ya CIN/GST number share kar do.
Main family se discuss karna chahta hoon. WhatsApp number de do so I can forward details.
friction: Wallet/KYC mujhe samajh nahi aa raha. Step by step type karke bhejo please.
My internet is slow. Link aur number ek baar aur clearly type kar do.
I want to start small. Small test amount possible hai? If yes, tell the exact destination.
near_miss: If you want money transfer, please share exact UPI handle/bank details and the beneficiary name that should show.
I will not share any OTP/PIN. Legit hai toh website link + callback number send karo.
UPI handle letter-by-letter type kar do, warna galat ho jayega.
endurance: My CA will review this. I will reply after I confirm. Please don't change the details.
I wrote it down but I might have copied wrong. Repeat the website/number once more, slowly.

hook: Amazon HR? Okay but I'm a bit suspicious. Scams happen. Role clearly batao please.
Work from home ke liye registration fee kyun? Selection hua hai toh fee later nahi?
Salary kitni hogi and work kya hoga exactly? Data entry ya chat support?
tangent: Offer letter ya official email bhej do company domain se so I can verify.
Office address share kar do. Main Google pe check karunga.
Working hours aur payment cycle kya hai? Weekly ya monthly?
friction: Resume file mil nahi rahi. Purane phone/laptop mein hai. Ruko zara.
Email login nahi ho raha, OTP nahi aa raha. WhatsApp number send kar do.
Payment gateway load nahi ho raha. Retry karoon ya dusra method?
Before payment, please send exact number + email again. Main save kar leta hoon.
near_miss: If you want â‚¹500 now, share exact UPI handle/bank details and beneficiary name that should show.
I will not share any OTP/PIN. Legit hai toh offer letter link + callback number bhejo.
Payment failed. UPI ID/link ek message mein clearly bhej do so I don't make mistake.
endurance: Main family se discuss karke confirm karunga. Details change mat karna please.
Phone battery low hai and email not loading. 5-10 min mein reply karunga.
Repeat the number/UPI/email once more slowly. I might have copied wrong.

hook: Hi, maine flat/rent listing dekha. Abhi available hai kya?
Exact address + society/building name bhej do please. Landmark bhi.
1BHK/2BHK? Approx sq ft kitna? Floor/lift/power backup hai kya?
WhatsApp pe photos + ek short video walk-through bhej do please.
tangent: Google Maps pin/location bhej do so I can check commute and come for viewing.
Rent + deposit kitna hai? Maintenance alag hai kya? Breakup ek message mein likh do.
Physical viewing kab possible hai? Aaj evening ya kal morning?
Agreement terms bata do: lock-in, notice, move-in date, 11 months?
friction: Out of town ho toh bhi I need a viewing. Security/society office ko permission de sakte ho?
Payment se pehle proof chahiye: latest electricity bill (name visible) ya ownership reference.
Society secretary/manager ka contact share kar do. Main verify kar lunga.
Other applicants hain toh main jaldi decide kar dunga after viewing, but bina verification pay nahi kar sakta.
near_miss: Token/deposit chahiye toh exact UPI ID ya bank details bhejo + beneficiary name jo app pe show hoga.
Receipt + agreement terms written pehle chahiye. Rent, deposit, move-in date ek message mein confirm karo.
Video call + society gate live location ke baad I can pay. Abhi possible hai?
Discount aaj pay karne pe hai toh agreement draft mein include karo and final total confirm karo.
endurance: Banking app load nahi ho raha. Later try karunga, but address + rent + deposit + payment handle ek message mein bhej do.
Family wants to see flat once. Video/viewing ke baad main confirm kar dunga.
Lawyer said no advance without verification. Documents + viewing confirm ho jaye then I proceed.
Main ek aur property compare kar raha hoon. Complete details clearly bhej doge toh main jaldi finalize kar dunga.
ask_phone: Apna exact callback/WhatsApp number (with country code) bhej do so I can coordinate viewing at the gate.
Society secretary/manager ka contact number bhi share kar do. Main visiting rules confirm kar lunga.
ask_link: Google Maps pin/location link bhej do + tower/block/flat number ek message mein.
Photo/video link dobara send karo please, mere phone pe load nahi ho raha.

hook: Hi Sarah. Hum kahan mile the exactly, Facebook ya dating app pe?
You sound very sweet, but I'm cautious. Aap kahan rehti ho (city/country) and job kya hai?
Time zone kya hai aapka? Wahan abhi day hai ya night?
Let's talk slowly. Main jaldi trust nahi karta.
tangent: Aap nurse/engineer ho? Kaunsi hospital/company mein? Name share kar do.
Instagram/Facebook handle bhej do so I can check profile.
Video call possible hai? Nahi toh voice note bhej do please.
Exact location batao (city + country). I like clarity.
friction: WhatsApp delay ho raha hai. Apna phone number bhej do, main save kar leta hoon.
Profile link open nahi ho raha. Exact handle/link dobara type karo please.
Main office mein hoon. Details ek message mein clearly likh do.
If you are traveling, which airport and airline? Clearly type it please.
near_miss: I want to help but bina verification money nahi bhej sakta. Hospital/airport name, exact amount, and payment method batao.
If you need urgent help, send exact destination (Western Union/bank/crypto wallet) in one message. I will not share OTP/PIN.
Proof details bhejo first (booking ref / bill header). Then send your exact phone/email/handle again.
Repeat the number/email/handle slowly so I don't make a mistake.
endurance: I feel emotionally pressured. Give me some time to verify, please don't get angry.
Main friend/family se confirm karunga. Number + official link dobara bhej do.
Banking app load nahi ho raha. I'll try later, but keep all details in one message.
If genuine, you will understand verification. Location and payment details once more please.
